<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update a project SMSS file"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/project-{projectId}/updateSmssFile"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Validates and updates the project's SMSS configuration file. Only project owners or admins may perform this action.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"projectId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"SMSS file updated successfully","content":{"application/json":{}}},"400":{"description":"Validation or processing error","content":{"application/json":{}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized / invalid session","content":{"application/json":{}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
